sections.heading: Filing
sections.text:
of certificate with county clerk; certain series of members of

limited-liability company deemed to be doing business in State under assumed or

fictitious name.

sections.heading: Limitations
sections.text:
on adoption of certain fictitious names; county clerk prohibited from accepting

violative certificates.

sections.heading: Contents
sections.text: and requirements of certificate and renewal certificate.

sections.heading: Authority
sections.text:
of county to provide for expiration of certificate; filing of renewal

certificate; notice to persons who have filed certificates.

sections.heading: Filing
sections.text: of new certificate upon change in partner or trustee.

sections.heading: Index
sections.text: of assumed or fictitious names: Maintenance by county clerk; contents.

sections.heading: Certified
sections.text: copies of certificate and register entries prima facie evidence.

sections.heading: Commencement
sections.text: of action barred when certificate not filed.
